data.actual_result: The voice channel is joined and it acts as if no audio is going through the microphone.
data.expected_result: The app should notify the user that they have denied microphone permissions and need to grant it to use voice channels.
data.short_description: When microphone permissions are denied voice channels continue to work without a prompt to grant mic permissions.
data.steps_to_repro: - Disable the microphone permission in settings - Join a voice channel
